original_text: He also provided more cedar logs than could be counted, for the Sidonians and Tyrians had brought large numbers of them to David.
korean_text: 또 백향목을 무수히 준비하였으니 이는 시돈 사람과 두로 사람이 백향목을 다윗에게로 많이 수운하여 왔음이라

sentences.original_text: He also provided more cedar logs
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 더 많은 삼목 통나무를 제공했고

sentences.original_text: had brought large numbers of them
